name: toxinder
description:
mirror mirror on the wall
who's the toxiest of them all....?

you feel like getting creepy messages by toxic men but don't want to download one of the many dating apps out there? well here you go! get overwhelmed with cheesy messages and swipe through profiles of the supposedly stronger sex.
enjoy !

A game by EckeUndKante.

Art by Kleo.

Coding by Jonas Jacobsen.  (https://jonasjoergenjacobsen.itch.io)

Nasty Sounds by Rubin.
